skills.name: Graceful Touch
skills.description: Attacks with a graceful touch and possesses the enemy with a 30% chance to increase the enemy's chances to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skills.name: Amuse
skills.description: Recovers the allies by 20% of my MAX HP and increases the Attack Power for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Dagger of Grudge
skills.description: Attacks with a secretly hidden blade. Inflicts damage that ignores all damage reduction effects. The damage also increases as your HP status decreases.
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-0.6*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's current HP % in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Current HP %</mark> + 2.8)
